name: For The Many '19
description:
FOR THE MANY...

When a snap winter election is called you must gather  your community, and head to the polls.

In the UK, on the 12 of December the polls open at 7am - and close at 10pm make sure you cast your vote, and I hope its a vote for change.

Guide community by picking up and Moving Rally Point , to carry the Rally point hold Joypad X, you can only hold the Rally point for so long , then you must wait until your strength recovers.

Movement = Right Joystick

Throw Snowball = Right Trigger

Select difficulty then press start, additional players press start to join.

Best PLAYED WITH A GAMEPAD or 2!
